Name: Marius

Name: Marius
Review Text: Amazing small homemrun restaurant .. amazing service and really good food tucked away in a quiet neighbourhood .... only serves dinner ... Bar next door is run by same owner and they do serves lunch !

Name: Marius
Review Text: Delicious fresh made food with great wine selection in a cosy Dutch setting bit out of the way but worth it .

Name: Marius
Review Text: The food was superb, the staff was super friendly and the restaurant was in general lovely. Absolutely worth a visit!

Name: Marius
Review Text: Marius has exceptionally great food and outstanding service. Wish I could afford to go here more often (we paid ‚Ç¨75 pp for a 4-course dinner, few glasses of high end wines and sparkling water). They do everything to accommodate you.

Name: Marius
Review Text: This place is fantastic. The menu we got had some skate, monkfish, chicken and a polenta cake served with apricot ice cream. All the plates were wonderful, nicely balanced and flavorful. ‚Ä¶

Name: Marius
Review Text: So far best place for dinner really fresh ingredients so tasty dishes , people are so kind and they know what they are doing not recommend YOU HAVE TO GO ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Marius
Review Text: We made reservations about a month in advance - boy are we glad we did. This meal was unlike any other we've had in New York. We had the four course dinner. Not one of the dishes were overridden with sauces or salt - we could clearly taste ‚Ä¶

Name: Marius
Review Text: Comfortable with delicious cuisine,helpful kind staff and fun atmosphere

Name: Marius
Review Text:
We walked here from the city centre.
The walk was long but it was worth it. We had the set menu and and wine package and it was worth every penny. The service was good but the waiters forgot to bring wine before the dishes, which is the only complaint I have.

Name: Marius
Review Text: Very nice French bistro style restaurant serving dinner in a small size space tucked away in a quiet neighborhood.  Food is Excellent, service is friendly. The owners typically come around and talk to customers.  Good wine list. Very nice experience.

Name: Marius
Review Text: Warm and welcoming service and delicious food.  The chef is very accommodating to different tastes or limitations and uses market vegetables generously to create beautiful and tasty dishes.  Definitely a restaurant worthy of its praise.

Name: Marius
Review Text: Lovely place and fresh and local food menu

Name: Marius
Review Text: We found this restaurant hyped as one of the best four in Amsterdam, which might be true, but were eventually not entirely convinced by it. We ended up paying 130‚Ç¨ for a meal for two people, and at least a couple of the dishes weren't on ‚Ä¶

Name: Marius
Review Text: Neighborhood gem this restaurant. Think it has been for sale for quite a while now so better go whilst you still can. Dishes and wines where fantastic. Service excellent.

Name: Marius
Review Text: Very good fixed four course menu. This is a shared kitchen with Worst. A good choice for something a bit "haut cuisine" but still a casual and relaxed evening.

Name: Marius
Review Text: My wife and I had dinner there. Enjoyed every course we had and the service was great. Not cheap but we would go back for special occasions.

Name: Marius
Review Text: One of the best meals I ever had!  Great and cozy atmosphere.

Name: Marius
Review Text: The place is cozy and nice and all the courses was delicious . A little bit expensive but it worth it. I totally recommend.

Name: Marius
